name: Nicole Gerardo
tagline: Because sometimes we need to learn new things...
body:
### Nicole Gerardo, Evolutionary Biologist
I am an evolutionary ecologist in the Department of Biology at Emory University. My laboratory studies the ecology and evolution of host-microbe interactions. We focus on insect systems as tractable experimental models. 

### Nicole Gerardo, Novice Programmer
While I have had some amazing bioinformaticians in my laboratory, I have little experience myself. I am currently trying to build those skills. 

### For More
You can see my laboratory's complete website at: https://scholarblogs.emory.edu/gerardolab/
